article_title: Claremore teen relies on her family, faith as she prepares to undergo radical cranial surgery
article_text:
Claremore, OK (74018)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then mainly cloudy during the afternoon with thunderstorms likely. A few storms may be severe. High 77F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms likely this evening. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms overnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: Tom Fink

og.description: By most accounts, Claremore youth Hannah Saylor is an average teenage girl.
